REST APIs with Mongodb

Sep 13, 2023

Build REST APIs with Mongodb

I built REST APIs with SQLDB connection, now I decide to challenge myself with Atlas mongodb.

The final APIs were deployed on cyclic

    https://node-serveur2.cyclic.cloud/getAllActors

    https://node-serveur2.cyclic.cloud/getActor/:actor_id

    https://node-serveur2.cyclic.cloud/getActor/addActor

    https://node-serveur2.cyclic.cloud/updateActor/:actor_id
        
    https://node-serveur2.cyclic.cloud/deleteActor/:actor_id

Welcome to my site, where I share my diaries as a web developer. Here you will find stories, insights, and tips from my personal and professional journey as a web developer. Whether you are a beginner, an experienced developer, or just curious about web development, you will find something interesting and useful here. I write about various topics related to web development, such as coding, design, tools, trends, challenges, and achievements. I also share my opinions, thoughts, and feelings about web development and how it affects my life. My goal is to inspire, inform, and entertain you with my diaries as a web developer.
